title: Sarah Palin Gets A Speeding Ticket, Says She 'Can't Drive 55'
teaser: The former governor faces a fine for exceeding the limit in Wasila, Alaska. She joked that the Sammy Hagar song distracted her, adding, "I wasn't speeding; I was qualifying."
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
